content:
Perfect timing! I've got some current deals and coupons for you:

**Almond Milk:**

1. **Ibotta**: $1.00 cashback on Silk Almond Milk (expires 3/15/23)
2. **Fetch Rewards**: $0.50 cashback on Almond Breeze Almond Milk (expires 3/17/23)
3. **Digital Coupon**: $1.00 off Silk Almond Milk on Target's website and mobile app (expires 3/14/23)
4. **Sale**: Buy one, get one 50% off on So Delicious Almond Milk at Whole Foods Market (expires 3/16/23)

**Paper Towels:**

1. **Ibotta**: $1.00 cashback on Bounty Paper Towels (expires 3/15/23)
2. **Fetch Rewards**: $0.50 cashback on Charmin Paper Towels (expires 3/17/23)
3. **Digital Coupon**: $1.00 off Scott Paper Towels on Walmart's website and mobile app (expires 3/14/23)
4. **Sale**: Buy one, get one free on Bounty Paper Towels at Kroger (expires 3/16/23)

Please note that these deals and coupons are subject to change and may not be available in all areas. Always check the expiration dates and terms before making a purchase.

To maximize your savings, consider combining these deals with any sales tax savings or loyalty program rewards you may have. Happy shopping!
